helpText.timeConstraint: Assign role only during a selected time period.

policyValidationMessages.VALID_PHONE_FORMAT: Must be a valid phone number
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER: Must be a number greater than or equal to zero.
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER_GREATER_ZERO: Must be a number greater than or equal to 1.
policyValidationMessages.VALID_TYPE: Must be one of the following types: %{validTypes}. Cannot be %{invalidType}
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_AT_LEAST_ONE_ATTRIBUTE_READONL: Must set at least one attribute permission to Read/Write
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MUST_CONTAIN_CREATE_OR_UPDATE_: Must have at least Create or Update Permission
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_X_CAPITAL_LETTERS: Must have at least %{numCaps} capital letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.IS_NEW: Must not be the same as the previous %{historyLength} passwords
policyValidationMessages.ALPHA_DASH: Must only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and underscores
policyValidationMessages.VALID_INT: Value must be of type integer.
